t: Amazon brand usage guidelines for 3-party display ads | Amazon Ads
s: At Amazon Creative may not use Amazon branded buttons unless expressly approved by Amazon. In smaller placements where the “available at Amazon” lockup is too small and difficult to read, third-party advertisers may typeset “Available at Amazon” in their typeface of choice with the word “Available” capitalized. The “available at Amazon” lockup should be used in all instances except where space is limited and the badge would fall ...

t: Amazon is dropping dozens of in-house brands you didn’t even know it owned | The Verge
s: August 10, 2023 - Amazon is getting rid of dozens of in-house clothing brands as it faces a potential antitrust lawsuit from the FTC, according to a report from The Wall Street Journal.

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 5 hours ago - Amazon opened its tenth physical bookstore in 2017; media speculation at the time suggested that Amazon planned to eventually roll out 300 to 400 bookstores around the country. All of its locations were closed in 2022 along with other retail locations under the "Amazon 4-Star" brand.

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Brand Stores help build brand awareness by showcasing your brand and product catalog on your own Amazon web address. You can create a Brand Store at no additional cost—with no coding necessary.

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: It's Our Job to Shop: These Are the Amazon Brands to Keep on Your Radar

t: The Life and Death of the Amazon Brands
s: August 15, 2023 - On Amazon, brands just don’t mean that much. This is evidently a lesson Amazon had to learn for itself, which is sort of funny, but not that big of a deal. The rise and fall of Amazon’s in-house brands is, however, related to a defining part of the company’s story over the last 15 years.

t: These 11 Cool-Girl Fashion Brands at Amazon Are Up to 50% Off RN
s: But in recent years, Amazon has also made a concerted effort to expand its stock to include in-house fashion brands, making its mark on yet another industry. With Prime Big Deal Days running October 8-9, now is the best time to save on fall fashion staples like cozy sweaters and timeless denim.
